articles.title: Appeals court rules against Biden administration's termination of 'remain in Mexico' policy - CNN
articles.description: The 5th US Circuit Court of Appeals on Monday night ruled against the Biden administration's bid to terminate the Trump-era "remain in Mexico" policy, which requires non-Mexican migrants to stay in Mexico until their US immigration court dates.
